sections.heading: Juneteenth day1-315.Juneteenth dayA. June 19, in each year, shall be observed as Juneteenth day.B. Juneteenth day is not a legal holiday.
sections.text: Juneteenth day1-315.Juneteenth dayA. June 19, in each year, shall be observed as Juneteenth day.B. Juneteenth day is not a legal holiday.
